content:
/>
XI.i.2.B.3.a
.
Preparing a Finding of the Fact of Death
Prepare a formal finding of the fact of death for the signature of a specified designee of the Veterans Service Center Manager or Pension Management Center Manager in the format shown in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, 1.C.2
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B  - Finding of Fact and Date of Death
citation: Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
